channel.title: Rsps help
channel.description: OMFG one of my staff members was playing and the server lagged him out...Then when he logged back in his account was like resetted.....Any help?

item.title: Rsps help
item.dc:creator: @nickyyy nickyyy
item.description:
@nickyyy wrote:

Sounds like a rollback issue, get better hosting or code in a simple save command, or auto saver, so if they disconnect they dont loose everything all the way back to their last login. As for the server shutting down i’d suggest getting a different, more user friendly source untill you can actually code.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps help
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Unless you plan on giving us more information (Code, EXACT errors (word for word), etc) I’ll be forced to start locking/removing topics.

Read full topic

lmfao. it kills the server.

item.title: Rsps help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

No. There’s nothing we can do what so ever. We can’t fix an unknown error. You need to figure out what happen, and then come back. Post an error code, something.
Once a player file is saved, it’s saved. There’s no undo button in that.
-Tired of your 30 topics in a day

Read full topic
